Darkness.name: Darkness
Darkness.description: All armies become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.Pvkj6MUcASchcy6x]{Concealed}, and distant armies become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}. Armies in these conditions take a –4 circumstance penalty on Scouting checks. Armies with darkvision ignore the terrain effects of darkness.

Difficult Terrain.name: Difficult Terrain
Difficult Terrain.description: A war encounter that takes place in rugged mountains, swampland, or dense forests are examples of difficult battlefield terrain. Armies take a –2 circumstance penalty on Maneuver checks in difficult terrain.

Dim Light.name: Dim Light
Dim Light.description: Armies in these conditions gain a +1 circumstance bonus on Maneuver checks and take a –2 circumstance penalty on Scouting checks. Distant armies become concealed. Armies with low-light vision or darkvision ignore the terrain effects of dim light.

Heavy Fog.name: Heavy Fog
Heavy Fog.description: All armies become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.Pvkj6MUcASchcy6x]{Concealed}, and distant armies become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}. Armies in these conditions take a –4 circumstance penalty on Scouting checks.

Light Fog or Rain.name: Light Fog or Rain
Light Fog or Rain.description: Armies in these conditions gain a +1 circumstance bonus on Maneuver checks and take a –2 circumstance penalty on Scouting checks. Distant armies become concealed.

Strong Wind.name: Strong Wind
Strong Wind.description: Ranged Strikes take a –1 circumstance penalty in strong wind. The penalty for a ranged Strike on a distant army is doubled to –10 (this penalty stacks with the standard penalty to ranged Strikes in wind).

Windstorms.name: Windstorms
Windstorms.description: Ranged Strikes take a –2 circumstance penalty in windstorms. The penalty for a ranged Strike on a distant army is doubled to –10 (this penalty stacks with the standard penalty to ranged Strikes in wind).
